PICOs.Population: Adult patients with KRAS G12C mutated locally advanced or metastatic non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) who have received at least one prior systemic therapy
PICOs.Outcomes: Objective response rate, duration of response, disease control rate, delay until response, progression-free survival, overall survival, quality of life, tolerance
